org.gbif.occurrencestore.download.service

Class SolrQueryVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.occurrencestore.download.service.SolrQueryVisitor

  • public class SolrQueryVisitor
extends Object
    This class builds clause for a Hive query from a Predicate object.

    This is not thread-safe but one instance can be reused. It is package-local and should usually be accessed through DownloadRequestServiceImpl. All visit methods have to be public for the Class.getMethod(String, Class[]) call to work. This is the primary reason for this class being package-local.

    The only entry point into this class is the getQuery method!

        public void visitCompoundPredicate(org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.predicate.CompoundPredicate predicate,
                          String op)
                            throws QueryBuildingException
        Builds a list of predicates joined by 'op' statements. The final statement will look like this: 
         ((predicate) op (predicate) ... op (predicate))
        Throws:
        QueryBuildingException
